text: Kong Lingwei (; born 28 July 1995 in Boli, Qitaihe) is a Chinese female sprinter,Heilongjiang Provincial Sports Bureau: (十三届省运会)专访田径四枚金牌得主孔令微 (2014-09-04 ) the goldlist for 4 × 100 metres relay title at 2014 Asian Games in Incheon. Setting an Asian record of female 4 × 200 metres relay in result of 1:34.89, she ranked the 4th for 200 metres relay at 2015 IAAF World Relays in Bahamas.Qitaihe.Gov: 勃利女孩孔令微：揣着梦想出征 (2016-08-05) ==References== == External links == * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female sprinters Category:Asian Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Asian Games silver medalists for China Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:People from Qitaihe Category:Runners from Heilongjiang
title: Kong Lingwei
